Positive Examples.input: Title: Office Party. Sentence 1: Larry worked at an accounting firm. Sentence 2: It was a boring job but it paid the bills. Sentence 3: Larry grew tired of doing the same thing every day. Sentence 4: He had the idea to have an office party.
